languages.text: {n}{g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Техножрец{/g} слушает откровения оператора пресса, в одночасье ставшей наводчицей могучего зенитного орудия, с нескрываемым изумлением. Линза визора потихоньку наливается алым.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}{g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Nехножрец{/g} слушает откровения оператора пресса, в одночасье ставшей наводчицей могучего орудия, с нескрываемым изумлением. Линза визора потихоньку наливается алым.{/n}

languages.text: {n}The {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priest{/g} cannot hide his amazement as he listens to the confessions of this paper press operator, who has been unceremoniously thrust into the ranks of the gunners and is now in charge of aiming this formidable anti-aircraft battery. His visor's lens gradually turns scarlet.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}{g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Техножрец{/g} слушает откровения оператора пресса, в одночасье ставшей наводчицей могучего зенитного орудия, с нескрываемым изумлением. Линза визора потихоньку наливается алым.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priest{/g} doesn't hide his amazement as he listens to the confessions of this paper press operator turned gunlayer who now wields the power of a formidable cannon. His visor's lense gradually turns scarlet.{/n}

{n}The {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priest{/g} doesn't hide his amazement as he listens to the confessions of this paper press operator turned gunlayer who now wields the power of a formidable cannon. His visor's lense gradually turns scarlet.{/n}

{n}The {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priest{/g} can't hide his amazement as he listens to the confessions of this paper press operator, who overnight propelled to the gunlayer ranks and is now in charge of aiming this formidable cannon. His visor's lens gradually turns scarlet.{/n}

{n}The {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priest{/g} can't hide his amazement as he listens to the confessions of this paper press operator, who overnight propelled to the gunlayer ranks and is now in charge of aiming this formidable cannon. His visor's lens gradually turns scarlet.{/n}

{n}The {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priest{/g} cannot hide his amazement as he listens to the confessions of this paper press operator, who has been unceremoniously thrust into the ranks of the gunners and is now in charge of aiming this formidable anti-aircraft battery. His visor's lens gradually turns scarlet.{/n}

{n}The {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priest{/g} cannot hide his amazement as he listens to the confessions of this paper press operator, who has been unceremoniously thrust into the ranks of the gunners and is now in charge of aiming this formidable cannon. His visor's lens gradually turns scarlet.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Techpriester{/g} kann sein Erstaunen nicht verbergen, als er den Geständnissen dieser Druckerin lauscht, die ohne Zeremonie in den Rang einer Schützin befördert wurde und nun für das Zielsystem dieser bemerkenswerten Flugabwehrbatterie verantwortlich ist. Die Linsen seines Visors färben sich nach und nach dunkelrot.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priest{/g} cannot hide his amazement as he listens to the confessions of this paper press operator, who has been unceremoniously thrust into the ranks of the gunners and is now in charge of aiming this formidable anti-aircraft battery. His visor's lens gradually turns scarlet.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Techpriester{/g} kann sein Erstaunen nicht verbergen, als er den Geständnissen dieser Druckerin lauscht, die über Nacht zur Richtschützin befördert wurde und nun für das Zielen mit dieser formidablen Kanone zuständig ist. Die Linsen seines Visors färben sich nach und nach dunkelrot.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Le {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}technoprêtre{/g} ne peut cacher sa sidération en écoutant les confessions de cette opératrice de presse à papier, propulsée de but en blanc au rang de canonnière et désormais chargée d'orienter la redoutable batterie antiaérienne. La lentille de sa visière vire peu à peu à l'écarlate.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priest{/g} cannot hide his amazement as he listens to the confessions of this paper press operator, who has been unceremoniously thrust into the ranks of the gunners and is now in charge of aiming this formidable anti-aircraft battery. His visor's lens gradually turns scarlet.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}technoprêtre{/g} ne peut cacher sa sidération en écoutant les confessions de cette opératrice de presse à papier, propulsée du jour au lendemain au rang de canonnière et désormais chargée d'orienter ce redoutable canon. La lentille de sa visière vire peu à peu à l'écarlate.{/n}

languages.text: {n}当{g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}技术神甫{/g}听完这位压纸操作员的忏悔之后，他几乎无法掩饰自己的震惊。因为这位压纸机操作员根本没有接受过正规训练，就匆匆忙忙地被推上了炮手席，负责瞄准这门威力强大的防空炮。帕斯卡面甲上的镜片逐渐变成了猩红色。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priest{/g} cannot hide his amazement as he listens to the confessions of this paper press operator, who has been unceremoniously thrust into the ranks of the gunners and is now in charge of aiming this formidable anti-aircraft battery. His visor's lens gradually turns scarlet.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}当{g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}技术祭司{/g}听完这位压纸操作员的忏悔之后，他几乎无法掩饰自己的震惊。因为这位操作员只接受过一晚上训练，就被推上了炮手席，负责瞄准这门威力强大的防空炮。帕斯卡面甲上的镜片逐渐变成了猩红色。{/n}

languages.text: {n}印刷機の操作員の告白を聞いて、{g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}技術司祭{/g}は驚きを隠せなかった。彼は不本意にも大砲の砲手へと昇進し、今はこの恐るべき対空砲で照準を定める責任を担っている。彼のバイザーのレンズは徐々に緋色に染まっていく。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priest{/g} cannot hide his amazement as he listens to the confessions of this paper press operator, who has been unceremoniously thrust into the ranks of the gunners and is now in charge of aiming this formidable anti-aircraft battery. His visor's lens gradually turns scarlet.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}印刷機の操作員の告白を聞いて、{g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}技術司祭{/g}は驚きを隠せなかった。彼は一夜にして大砲の砲手に昇進し、今はこの恐るべき大砲で照準を定める責任を担っている。彼のバイザーのレンズは徐々に緋色に染まっていく。{/n}

languages.text: {n}El {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}tecnosacerdote{/g} no puede ocultar su asombro al escuchar las confesiones de esta operaria de imprenta, que de la noche a la mañana ha sido convertida en artillera y ahora está encargada de disparar esta formidable batería antiaérea. La lente de su visor se vuelve escarlata poco a poco.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priest{/g} cannot hide his amazement as he listens to the confessions of this paper press operator, who has been unceremoniously thrust into the ranks of the gunners and is now in charge of aiming this formidable anti-aircraft battery. His visor's lens gradually turns scarlet.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}tecnosacerdote{/g} no puede ocultar su asombro al escuchar las confesiones de este operario de imprenta, que de la noche a la mañana fue ascendido a las filas de los artilleros y ahora es el encargado de disparar este formidable cañón. La lente de su visor se vuelve escarlata poco a poco.{/n}

languages.text: {n}{g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tekno Rahip{/g}, yalapşap bir emirle topçu saflarına itilip bu heybetli havasavar bataryasının hedeflenmesinden sorumlu kılınmış matbaa makinesi operatörünün itiraflarını dinlerken hayretini gizleyemiyor. Vizörünün merceği, yavaş yavaş kırmızıya dönüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priest{/g} cannot hide his amazement as he listens to the confessions of this paper press operator, who has been unceremoniously thrust into the ranks of the gunners and is now in charge of aiming this formidable anti-aircraft battery. His visor's lens gradually turns scarlet.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}{g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tekno Rahip{/g}, yalapşap bir emirle topçu saflarına itilip bu heybetli havasavar bataryasının hedeflenmesinden sorumlu kılınmış matbaa makinesi operatörünün itiraflarını dinlerken hayretini gizleyemiyor.
